title: To everything there is a season
creator_credit: Bosisto Productions, South Australian Film Corporation and Brian Bosisto
brief_description: A general interest film exposing one of South Australia’s wildlife sanctuaries located at the Coorong. It instructively illustrates the interaction between the birds and the landscape against a backdrop of seasonal change. Of particular interest to students of the life sciences, conservationists and bird-watching societies. Narrated by John and Judith Dick.
